title: How to Make a Salted Popcorn Caramel Shake

steps.headline: Put milk, ice cream and sauce into a blender.
Pour the mixture into a glass.
steps.description: Ensure that there is enough room for the popcorn.

steps.headline: Place the popcorn kernels into the brown paper bag.
Fold over the edge of the brown paper bag to conceal the popcorn kernels.
Microwave for 3 minutes or until last kernel pops.
Put the popcorn on top of the caramel shake.
Serve with a straw and spoon.

text: Put milk, ice cream and sauce into a blender.  Blend for 20 seconds. The mixture should be creamy. Pour the mixture into a glass. Ensure that there is enough room for the popcorn. Place the popcorn kernels into the brown paper bag.  Fold over the edge of the brown paper bag to conceal the popcorn kernels.  Place in the microwave.  Microwave for 3 minutes or until last kernel pops.  Put the popcorn on top of the caramel shake.  Sprinkle with salt.  Serve with a straw and spoon.
